MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH42 Tranmere area affecting properties in Ivydale Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 12:33pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 13:03pm on 12th February 2021
